title: It was a privilege being even a 'second tier' friend to my girl crush, Deborah Orr
text:
Rowan Pelling pays tribute to the much-loved, honest, witty and direct journalist Deborah Orr, who died this week aged 57

I’m not a fan of the starling chatter of Twitter. There’s only one person I’ve ever enjoyed following and that’s the brilliant journalist and self-proclaimed “womanist” Deborah Orr, who died on Saturday evening. Deborah was as trenchant, funny, truthful and idiosyncratic in her tweets as she was in person; hence her 63,000, mostly female followers.

Starting the day with a Deborah Orr tweet was like smashing the ice for a bracing five-second dip. A typical example might be her riposte to the news story about Maurizio Cattelan’s stolen artwork – a gold lavatory – that was...
description: Rowan Pelling pays tribute to the much-loved, honest, witty and direct journalist Deborah Orr, who died this week aged 57
